summary.para: The SP_ORIGINAL_FILE_INFO structure receives the original INF file name and catalog file information returned by .

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The setupapi.h header defines SP_ORIGINAL_FILE_INFO as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: Size of this structure, in bytes.
Original file name of the INF file stored in array of size MAX_PATH.
Catalog name of the INF file stored in array of size MAX_PATH.
